possible security issues

Pages amazon security Lake the service
where the logs will be pulled from is a
fully maned security data Lake service
that centralizes security data from AWS
environments SAS providers on premises
and Cloud sources into a purpose built
data Lake stored in your account
security lake has adopted the open cyber
security schema framework also known as
ocsf and open standard with ocsf support
the service normalizes and combines
security data from ews and a broad range
of Enterprise security data sources into
a common format let's get into the demo
